mapper.select: select pk_empnum, name, phone, email, emppicturename, emppicturefilename, s.spotnamekor, d.deptnamekor from tbl_employee E join tbl_spot S on e.fk_spotnum = s.pk_spotnum join tbl_department D on e.fk_deptnum = d.pk_deptnum where resignationstatus = 0 and not name like '%'||'관리'||'%' order by fk_deptnum asc, fk_spotnum desc

select pk_empnum, ${searchType}, phone, email, emppicturename, emppicturefilename, s.spotnamekor, d.deptnamekor from tbl_employee E join tbl_spot S on e.fk_spotnum = s.pk_spotnum join tbl_department D on e.fk_deptnum = d.pk_deptnum where RESIGNATIONSTATUS = 0 and not name like '%'||'관리'||'%' and (lower(${searchType}) like '%'||lower(#{searchWord})||'%' or lower(deptnamekor) like '%'||lower(#{searchWord})||'%') order by ${searchType} asc
select pk_deptnum, deptnameeng, deptnamekor from tbl_department order by pk_deptnum asc
select pk_empnum, name, phone, email, emppicturename, emppicturefilename from tbl_employee where fk_deptnum = #{pk_deptnum} order by fk_spotnum desc
